transcription.text: They say it takes a village and the village it seems has moved online with countless baby bloggers dishing out advice for desperate parents - many of whom are exceptionally sleep deprived. @jampikeletsâ€™s video satirises the plethora of social media posts offering parental guidance while also poking fun at relationship dynamics to hilarious results. A welcome reprieve to many daunted by an upcoming daylight savings sleep transition. 4am start anyone?
